product_name: Salomon Hydro 45 Hydration Waist Belt - 20 fl. oz.
long_description: Wrap the Salomon Hydro 45 Hydration Waist Belt around your hips and enjoy comfort and easy access to your water on your next moderate-length run. Adjustable webbing belt with vented back panel offers snug and breathable comfort. 45deg holster holds the included 20 fl. oz. water bottle at an easy angle for grabbing while on the go. The Salomon Hydro 45 Hydration Waist Belt features a zippered pocket that holds small essentials.
